values:
Hey! 

I'm updating just for David, who wanted me to.

I got my homecoming pictures back today.  They are so good, make sure you see them.

I'm into ghetto music these days....what's wrong with me?! 

Life is great :)  Hope yours is too!

Love you~

BEACH WEEK with my cousins and friends was absolutely AWESOME!  

I love them sooooo much.
I sure didn't want to come home.

But now i'm back and some sneaky person wrote on my car today...
who was it?  my guess is Megan, GA, and Lacey.
Thanks for making me feel loved guys.

Best moments of this past week:
shaving cream fight
learning to wake board and succeeding
spending time with Annie, Lou, Pat, Tay, Will, and Drew
playing four square
floating in the water
swings with annie!
lunch with my aunt cary
BE a MAN!
making hemp bracelets for everyone
eating ice cream, pudding, and cheese cake on the beach
then of course our great time together after we ate on the beach;)
I LOVE YOU GUYS! THANKS FOR THE BEST WEEK EVER~

Thankfully
the love of Jesus
is so great 

it makes up for the love 

i've missed.

HEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEY!

Ben and Annie are my favorite because they can entertain me at 12:06 in the morning...the day of the hit....dundunDUN!

Let's see what i did on saturday:
awoke to a beautiful day at noon~ isn't it weird how the day before a hurricane it's always pretty

ate some breakfast b/c that's all i can eat right when i wake up...not lunch
hummm.........

organized my cd's = very important business 

watched movies

hung out with the wonderful awesome amazing suzanne

talked online to my wonderful texas buddies

and that was my day for you! exciting...i know



so here you go, for your hurricane entertainment, i give you a questionnaire to cease the boredom for a moment in time: (post your answers)
1.  If you could be stuck in a sealed room with one person for 3 days and 4 nights, who would it be and why?
2.  If you could be a dance move for 10 years what would it be?
3.  If you could be any where in the world right now, where would it be?
4.  What is your brilliant plan for stopping the hurricane from coming (i know you've thought about it)?
5.  If you were a hershey bar would you rather be frozen and forgotten about, be melted in a young boys pocket and then put in the laundry, become a smore, be the topping on ice cream, or just eattin?

Hope all of you play it safe!

I love you all dearly.  hughug kiss kiss

Ever stepped back and wondered why life brought you to where you are right now.

I have.





God has a plan in it all, but right now it's 
hard to trust, 
hard to believe,
hard to overcome this moment.



I'm so blessed.

so i feel selfish to be upset...




I hope you are enjoying every moment.
God is so good.

Senior shirt money is due today!

$10 drop if off at my house

I still need $ from:
Lacey S
Katie D
Brittany J

~anyone else is welcome to buy one if I get there money by the end of the day~

so...if YOU talk to any of these people please tell them to come give me there mulla!

Thanks~

Be blessed

SENIOR SHIRTS!

If you want a senior shirt with this group....

give me $10
plus name, size, number, and email
to my house by July 6th (next Wednesday)

anyone is welcome to order one
spread the word to your friends

if friends are out of town then i need someone to pay for them 
or else I can't order them a shirt.

thanks~
Lala

*call with questions*

Eat at CHICK-FIL-A tonight

from 5pm - 8pm

Bayou Blvd. location

say you're there to support St. Christophers youth group

and our mission trip to Texas gets 20% of the profit!

Bring your family and friends...make it a party!

thanks~

LISTEN UP!

If you are going to be a senior next year and you are a girl, you are invited:

Tonight, Wednesday, we are having a meeting about senior shirts.
My house
8pm
bring ideas

anyone is welcome to come.

spread the word!!!!!!!

see you tonight :)

You are a joy.
You are a blessing.
You are an answered prayer.

Know that Jesus put you here for a purpose, your not just another person to him.
Jeremiah 29:11

Be strong!
I can do all thing through Christ who gives me strength! Phil. 4:13

and know...
that you are love...
by me!

Nika is gone.  


She left this morning and i didn't even get to say goodbye b/c no one woke me up, so that was upseting.  It's weird now....i no longer have a sister.  





I miss her.

Hey Boos!

I'm babysitting at my cousins house at the moment.  Erin, my cousin in 3rd grade, is the worst baseball player on his team and has never hit a ball and today he hit 2 and got the game ball!  woohoo go him!~
i'm not going to school tom. b/c i'm spending quality time with the mom and nika.  yay no school but i'm doing absolutely nothing so it's all good.
Although i still have scotti's and danny's yearbooks...hummmmm
Yeah agreeing with Jenny i did some major yearbooking today too.  it's like everyone wanted me to sign there yearbook today, i felt so loved :)
i'm really tired and falling asleep but have to stay awake...someone call me right now and entertain me.

Good luck all you chorus girls....Lacey, Katie, and Sarah!  Yall are going to do an amazing job.  *Shine for God's glory girls*

hung out with Mandy, Kaile, Deann, and Angie today....they are some awesome girls.  I love you, JERKS.  j/k

"Two are better than one...when one falls down a friends can help him up." Ecc. 4:9-10
"A friend loves at all time..." proverb
"Friends come and friends go but a true friend sticks closer than family." proverb (there that's the right words to the verse ben...by memory...haha)
Cherish one another, time is precious.

Hey! 
Listen up if...
you know i have an exchange student living with me
you know her name is Nika
you have spoken more than 5 words to her

if this is you, i got an invite for you...
Going away surprise party-this Saturday-ice cream party-4pm-my house-be there-

if you don't know Nika...well come anyways if you want some ice cream :)

Love you all!~

God's peace

Hey Everyone!

I'm back writing and looking at my livejournal now!  woohoo  I know your excited.
well for the past 40 days (actually it ended up being longer than that b/c i'm a slacker) I've been fasting from the world (livejournal and aim) and feasting on God, while reading a book that went along with it.  It was amazing.  The book is A Call to Die if you are interested, let me know.  God is so good!!!!

So....school is almost out.  Yay!  I want to hear everyone's summer plans.

Guess what....Suzanne Beard is starting up cell group again this summer at my house.  I'm so excited.  Same time too.  We're starting soon but don't know exactly when.  if you were involved with it before--you better be back, but if you have know idea what it is then you better come check it out.  

I had a great day.  I just want to thank you personally for being an amazing person in my life.  You are incredible and I just don't know what I would do without you to make me smile!  Thanks~

AMAZING!

today was great b/c it was friday and i only went to school for 4 periods then got checked out.
and guess where i went.......
not to the moon
not to the top of the Eiffel tower
no...
to see the dead sea scrolls in mobile with Nika, my mo, Alex Tredway, and her mo

Let me just tell you it was amazing.  it was a pretty big exhibit and the scrolls were so cool.  it was crazy to think how old they are (around the time of Christ) and how preserved they were.  The scrolls were found by a shepard throwing a rock while he was trying to find a lost goat.  the rock fell into a hole.  before the boys knew it, they had discovered a cave with lost history in it--pieces of the bible!  These documents are the oldest scrolls of the bible found which was 1000 years earlier then the next documents.  that means that the bible was kept almost exactly the same by word of mouth for 1000 years....crazy!  it was so cool to see the actual thing.  the writing was all in hebrew so we couldn't exactly read it but there was translations and i was able to pick out the word Lord in one of them (which was cool).  

If you ever have a chance to go...take it!!!!
This is a once in a lifetime chance and experience.

As for the rest of the day...
we went to spring hill college to go to a flower festival
which by the way i saw this gorgeous arch which is going to be at my wedding...i've decided!
then we visited spring hill a little bit with one of my cousins that goes there.
It was really an awesome school.  I'm seriously thinking about it.  It was all i wanted in a college...but i'm worried about it being a Catholic college.  that's the only thing

then we went to dinner...yum yum...i ate salad...go me! :)

So i had a wonderful day and i certainly hope you did too.

Be blessed by His grace.

Today was a great day!

First Priority this morning..whoopwhoop!

then FCAT.  i finished in like 20 mins.  then i almost got in trouble for taking out vocab study cards when the test was still on my desk.  she got really mad.  but o well.  so i study until my heart was content b/c i had to make-up the test 5th period.  well i ended up having so much time that i just about wanted to stand up-scream, rip my cards in half, then run all through the halls singing :) soooo boring and pointless.  why do adults have to force me into doing absolutly pointless things in my life...i mean my life is ticking away in that useless spent time.

vocab test was ok.  mrs. mcleod had a sentence that read like this:
After hearing the emphatic (loud, shout, noisy) sounds coming from the cafeteria the deans rushed to the __________ _________ (change word), to discipline the ________,_________ students.  ahhh crazy who's ever heard of 4 blanks in one sentence!

Then we watched a moive in physics.

worked in spanish....boooo

then i went home and slept.  which was much needed

when i awoke, i went over to suzanne's for a yummy dinner she made sergei, ben, and i...it was great fun

now i'm home.  

If you don't know it already, you are loved and appreciated!

Thanks for smiling at me today,
you made me smile too.
Thanks for asking how i was,
you made me know you cared.
Thanks for being there,
because you made my day!

*Who made your day just a little bit better today...all it takes is a simple to smile to brighten someone's day...Who's day did you brighten?

"You are my shepard, i shall not be in want.  You lie me down in green pastures, You lead me beside quiet waters, You restore my soul.  You guide me along the paths of rightousness for You're name sake." Psalm 23

~Let Him restore your soul.  
Hand it over to your Maker and He will put the pieces back together!

Sleep is soooo good.
Life is soooo good.
God is soooo good.
Friends are soooo good.
Family is soooo good.

Thanks God for blessing me so much....it's all b/c of you!

so sleep in this morning and have yet to go to school...woohoo!  

Last night had dinner at Lacey's house...yummy.  it was so good.
then we watched interesting stuff :) haha

today i have to go to school for 3 periods. way exciting!
then FP meeting sometime...

i hope i can work out before then b/c man i'm getting fat!  haha j/k please don't shoot me!

Remember that i care about you and appreciate you!

Hey!  Guess what this is my new livejournal.  Isn't it exciting!!! b/c now you can know all about my live with a click of a button.  Although i'm really computer stupid (Come along Nancy) so i'm not really sure how to do this livejournal thingy...Lacey did it all for me last night...woohoo.  she's the best.  ok well have a super Sunday....day of rest....GO REST!

Love you all!

P.S. I want more friends--so if you want to be my friend give me your livejournal name...please and thank you.
Lacey just made this livejournal.  wooo!!!!!  leave a comment. you rock.  I love you.
